data.title: James Franklin JOHNSON
data.text:
NOTES:

According to 1900 census, James Franklin was the County Clerk for Leon Co. and a farmer. After his first wife died, James remairried a Mary E.? Lamb who was the manager for the local telephone company in the 1830 census, I believe she was buried in Teague, TX. James moved with his brother to Coleman Co., TX and is buried there at the Burkett Cemetery.
